stripped_text: The first time the Runner spends 1 or more click during their turn, gain 2 credits. If those click were spent to take an action, the first time during that action a run on this server begins, pay 2 credits. Errata from CR 1.2
text:
The first time the Runner spends 1 or more [click] during their turn, gain 2[credit]. If those [click] were spent to take an action, the first time during that action a run on this server begins, pay 2[credit].
<errata>Errata from CR 1.2</errata>
title: Sundew
